title: Would any Rioters like to play with me for my 1000th ARAM game?
body:
Hey everyone! 

So, ARAM's my all time favorite game mode. I play it constantly and I really enjoy it.. So I've noticed that I'm nearing that 1000 mark.. I wanted to ask if anyone from Riot would like to play with me and a few of my friends? I saw that people seek this AFTER their 1000th game.. but I'd like to make my 1000th memorable by playing FOR my 1000th. 

And well.. If I lose- I guess we'll have best of 2? Haha.

I figure since ARAM's are quick and fun, I could hold your attention before you guys get back to hard work!

I'm currently at my 999th! <3

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

replies.body: I might have a bit of time later tonight around 6:30 PST.  I'll add you and see if you're free.

...wanna play with me for my 1010th win...?
http://www.reactionface.info/sites/default/files/imagecache/Node_Page/images/1311000574183.gif

What an honor!!

Aww man! I didnt see this reply til now- I had an overnight shift at work ðŸ˜¥ 

But if you're still alright we can try to get another time youre comfy with!
Goodluck with this! Hope you find a Rioter soon!
bumping and upvoted for exposure. good luck, hope it works out :D
I hope they play with you bro <3
Thank you so much! Super kind of you <3
